definition: to match/in tune/reasonable
to put up/to build (scaffolding)/to hang (clothes on a pole)/to connect/to join/to arrange in pairs/to match/to add/to throw in (resources)/to take (boat, train)/variant of 褡[da1]
to harmonize/to reconcile/to blend/to suit well/to adjust/to regulate/to season (food)/to provoke/to incite
to transfer/to move (troops or cadres)/to investigate/to enquire into/accent/view/argument/key (in music)/mode (music)/tune/tone/melody

sentences.english: Because your minds are compatible, you are able to understand each other much more quickly than you would otherwise.
sentences.chinese: 因为你们的想法搭调，所以比平时能更快地理解对方。

sentences.english: She was wearing a light blue shirt that just matched her car.
sentences.chinese: 她身着一件浅蓝色的衬衫，和她的车颜色很搭调。

sentences.english: Rose's clothes and hat don't match.
sentences.chinese: 罗斯的衣服和帽子不搭调。

sentences.english: You know certain things doesn'tgo uh with other things aesthetically.
sentences.chinese: 你知道有些东西和别的东西就美学而言是不搭调的。

sentences.english: The city itself is kind of like a small town with tourism tagged onto it.
sentences.chinese: 这个城市其实就是个小镇，旅游业似乎与它并不搭调。

sentences.english: This is a very nice sketch, but the style is not approprite for our game.
sentences.chinese: 这个草图很好，但是风格同我们的游戏不搭调。

sentences.english: And bear in mind that I have myself been known to wear non-matching accessories in my time.
sentences.chinese: 反正我记得我以佩戴不搭调的配饰而出名。

definition: to contrast/to set off one another/to go well with
to match/well-suited
unwell/indisposed/out of sorts/euphemism or honorific for ill
to be well matched/to suit
tasty/to one's liking
to bring out the best in each other (idiom)/to complement one another well
(idiom) inharmonious/incompatible
tacky/inelegant/in poor taste/vulgar/banal
to mix and match (of clothing etc)
to pair up/to match/to arrange in pairs/to add sth into a group
able to withstand careful appreciation/well worth a second look
in time with (i.e. same rhythm)/to keep in step with/fig. to cooperate
perfect match
to show poor taste
to get along well/compatible/also written 和得來|和得来[he2 de5 lai2]
according with the times/seasonal
